data_table.description: Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: HPCB1
variable.description: I am quick tempered. Q1 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB2
variable.description: I have a fiery temper. Q2 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB3
variable.description: I am a hotheaded person. Q3 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB4
variable.description: I get angry when I am slowed down by other mistakes. Q4 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB5
variable.description: I feel annoyed when I am not given recognition for doing good work. Q5 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB6
variable.description: I fly off the handle. Q6 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB7
variable.description: When I get angry, I say nasty things. Q7 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB8
variable.description: It makes me furious when I am criticized in front of others. Q8 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB9
variable.description: When I get frustrated, I feel like hitting someone. Q9 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCB10
variable.description: I feel infuriated when I do a good job and get a poor evaluation. Q10 [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCBFLAG
variable.description: 1= HPCB form is present [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: HPCBCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Health and Life Profile (Spielberger Trait Anger Scale), exam 4]
